blog.name: my-city-of-glory
blog.title: My Soul Is Empty And Full of White Girls

summary: The outline of the smiling conspiracy
body:
The outline of the smiling conspiracy

by Nate_The_Brave_Hibiscus

Character: Mary Jane Watson

Words: outline, smile, conspiracy

Pairing: MJ/Peter Parker

Warnings: Ugh, it’ll be a spoiler I guess but not a major one so: coma, loneliness, I’m bad at titles

Words: 1084

@marvelwritingchallenge

My name is Mary Jane Watson. I’m twenty one and in college. I’m a girlfriend of Peter Parker AKA Spider-Man. And I’m alone today. Well, I guess I have been for a while now. I haven’t really realised it because of how busy I constantly am but deep down I have felt it for a long time.

But today is different. Something’s wrong. People who I am used to see only frowning are suddenly smiling at me at every opportunity they have. I mean, I know I’m pretty but this doesn’t feel right. Like something bad is happening right now but I can’t see it. It feels like something important but I can’t seem to wrap my head around it.

Back to the weird smiles… I get them from two people who I’m not that close with and to be honest, I hate them. With passion. Every time I see them I want to either yell or cry and I never know which is which. The outline of the suspects are pretty casual, I’d say:

Mrs Warren is my boss. She’s the owner of the Woken TV and I’m an intern. I’ve always dreamt of becoming a journalist and now I have a chance to gain some experience. She isn’t rude but she has never smiled before. It’s weird.

The second person is Jerry. He’s a boy a little older than me who moved in the apartment next to mine. When I saw him for the first time he had a neutral face which didn’t change for the next two weeks. I thought he just wasn’t able to show any kind of emotions but then suddenly he’s smiling at me when I greet him in the morning.

I’m not saying it’s not nice but it’s unnerving. I need to find the bottom of this. People don’t just change like that. Maybe someone is blackmailing them? Or they’re not “them”? I have a lot of ideas but I don’t need ideas. I need leads and proofs. That’s why I’m looking through every news article that says anything about people who started to behave like not themselves.  I am currently sitting in the library near my college and I might fall asleep if I don’t find anything interesting soon.

“Excuse me, miss, but could I ask you something?” I look up to find a woman, probably in her thirties, looking at me unsurely.

“Of course, madame.” I smiled politely and she relaxed a little.

“Are you Mary Jane Watson? The famous girl who knows, I’m sorry, knew Spider-Man?” Oh… Right. Peter…

“I… Yeah. I love him.” I give her my fake smile.

“Didn’t we all…?” Woman mumbles more to herself than me. I can’t believe I haven’t thought of this before. Oh, know I think about it. It’s obvious. There’s no conspiracy.

Smile. That was what has always been on my lips when Spidey was still here. I haven’t smiled sincerely since he disappeared almost a year ago. How could I get so caught up with work to realise?

I need to see May. She’s probably not okay now. It’s an anniversary tomorrow.

“Excuse me, I need to get somewhere.” I say quietly and stand up. The woman gives me the smile I saw on Mrs Warren and Jerry. This particular smile that says: “I’m sorry for you, you poor thing.” I hate it. They treat Spider-Man like he died. Peter just has some problems. He’s okay. He’s coming back. He has to.

I walk out of the library and almost run to the small apartment in Queens. I take a deep breath and knock on the door. A moment later a skinny woman opens them and gives me a smile.

This smile. This one is different. She understands. She feels the same. She hurts too.

“Good afternoon, Aunt May.” I say and she hugs me.

“Afternoon, MJ. I hoped we could meet today and here you are.” We separate and I walk into Parker’s flat.

“Well, tomorrow it’ll be a year.” I try to smile but my eyes start watering as I look at the very sofa I sat with my Pete only twelve months ago.

“Yeah…”

“You know, May, I thought my boss and neighbor were conspiring against me. They, well, were always not the types to smile but suddenly today they just started to do so.  I thought I was in some kind of danger. Old habits die hard, huh?

…

I wish I was able to hug him again…” I whispere and May sits besides me.

“Me too dear, me too. Do you want to come to the Tower with me tomorrow?”

“I’d like that. Thank you, May.” I hug her and she draw circles on my back.

“It’s gonna be alright, sweetie. Let me tell you an outline of tomorrow’s plan, okay? First thing first, you sleep here tonight and in the morning we eat breakfast together. Then Happy will drive us to the Avengers Tower and we meet with Peter. We eat lunch and decide if we want to go back yet. Sounds good?”

“Yeah. Thank you, May.”

“No problem, my dear. Coffee or tea?” We let go of each other and smile.

“Tea, please.” The woman stand up nodding and I lean back against the cushions. The smile…

Why do I hate it so much? It may be the fact that I still have hope. Maybe it’s because I’m one of the few who knows that Spider-Man is Peter Parker. Or maybe I am just too close to a breakdown to handle pity.

If only I hadn’t gone there. Petey would probably be here with his aunt. I just had to sneak into one of the most dangerous places in the whole New York, didn’t I? No. Peter wouldn’t want me to blame myself. He’d want me to be better. It was a mistake. Nobody’s fault. Well, maybe Green Goblin’s since he was the one who attacked. Spider-Man was just in the right place in the wrong time and got hurt in the head too much to just get up and be okay. Just a little too late Iron Man was next to him after shooting Goblin. Just a few seconds too late and I’m alone again. Aunt May is alone again. New York is alone again.

I can see pretty much the outline of the future: people without smiles and conspiracy theories if Spider-Man has ever been real.

I can’t wait for Peter to wake up and show everyone that he can do it. Not because of some crazy spider powers but because he has us. His family. And we are not planning on leaving him anytime soon.

“Afternoon, MJ. I hoped we could meet today and here you are.” We separate and I walk into Parker’s flat.

“Well, tomorrow it’ll be a year.” I try to smile but my eyes start watering as I look at the very sofa I sat with my Pete only twelve months ago.

“Yeah…”

“You know, May, I thought my boss and neighbor were conspiring against me. They, well, were always not the types to smile but suddenly today they just started to do so.  I thought I was in some kind of danger. Old habits die hard, huh?

…

I wish I was able to hug him again…” I whispere and May sits besides me.

“Me too dear, me too. Do you want to come to the Tower with me tomorrow?”

“I’d like that. Thank you, May.” I hug her and she draw circles on my back.

“It’s gonna be alright, sweetie. Let me tell you an outline of tomorrow’s plan, okay? First thing first, you sleep here tonight and in the morning we eat breakfast together. Then Happy will drive us to the Avengers Tower and we meet with Peter. We eat lunch and decide if we want to go back yet. Sounds good?”

“Yeah. Thank you, May.”

“No problem, my dear. Coffee or tea?” We let go of each other and smile.

“Tea, please.” The woman stand up nodding and I lean back against the cushions. The smile…

Why do I hate it so much? It may be the fact that I still have hope. Maybe it’s because I’m one of the few who knows that Spider-Man is Peter Parker. Or maybe I am just too close to a breakdown to handle pity.

If only I hadn’t gone there. Petey would probably be here with his aunt. I just had to sneak into one of the most dangerous places in the whole New York, didn’t I? No. Peter wouldn’t want me to blame myself. He’d want me to be better. It was a mistake. Nobody’s fault. Well, maybe Green Goblin’s since he was the one who attacked. Spider-Man was just in the right place in the wrong time and got hurt in the head too much to just get up and be okay. Just a little too late Iron Man was next to him after shooting Goblin. Just a few seconds too late and I’m alone again. Aunt May is alone again. New York is alone again.

I can see pretty much the outline of the future: people without smiles and conspiracy theories if Spider-Man has ever been real.

I can’t wait for Peter to wake up and show everyone that he can do it. Not because of some crazy spider powers but because he has us. His family. And we are not planning on leaving him anytime soon.

summary:
“The war made me upset so i decided to turn everyone into lizards”
It’s one of those moments when you gotta wonder “is this...
body:
“The war made me upset so i decided to turn everyone into lizards”

It’s one of those moments when you gotta wonder “is this attempt to give our creations depth worth it considering that it will be paired with our previous silly bs?” The answer is always yes, of course.

blog.name: akasharpiegirl
blog.title: Kayla the insomniac writer
blog.description: She/her, ace, writer, Hufflepuff, conspiracy theorist. Welcome to the void.

summary: The Avengers Saying Things I Overhear at my School (feat. Ned) — 8:
body:
The Avengers Saying Things I Overhear at my School (feat. Ned) — 8:

Tony: you know what’s scary?

Peter and Ned: What?

Tony: Supposedly longer you live with your significant other, the more you look like them

Peter: Woah

Tony, in awe: I hope that’s true, because Miss Potts is hot.

blog.name: tiny-tales-of-terror
blog.title: Tiny Tales of Terror
blog.description: Spine-tingling tales from the masters of mini-mirth and the micro-macabre, every day at 13 o'clock (i.e. 1 PM Eastern). Also on Twitter and Instagram as @tinytalesterror.

summary: The thin man lived in the walls of their house, spying on them during the day and tormenting them at night... Or at least, he...
body: The thin man lived in the walls of their house, spying on them during the day and tormenting them at night… Or at least, he did until they day they were hanging pictures and the stud finder pinged off his sternum.

blog.title: The Mary Jane Experience

summary: It always trows me off a little when people talk about Peter as someone who’s oblivious or awkward in relationships when,...
body:
It always trows me off a little when people talk about Peter as someone who’s oblivious or awkward in relationships when, actually, whenever he likes someone, he comes on strong, like, Really strong, like, WOW ohmygodgetaroom strong, but then I realized… so do they. I was thinking “Peter Parker has no trouble getting into relationships, he’s not shy” and he’s not, but also all the people he’s gotten with were as shameless at flirting as him. 

And I think of poor Liz, who tried SO HARD and at the end of high school when she told Peter she liked him he was SHOCKED, even though he started out liking her. And of Deb, who was obviously hung up on him and he “didn’t notice” (coughcoughretconcoughcough) because apparently he “didn’t like her” yet. Like, you could literally trip over your both feet and then someone else’s to please him and he won’t notice you’re in love with him unless you flirt with him. 

Also, maybe it’s good and maybe it’s bad, but you’ll always know if he likes you because that man is outrageous. Imagine, you’re at your aunt’s house, her and her best friend, his aunt, in the next room, you’ve talked a bit over dinner and he comes at you with “so what do you like to do, besides driving men crazy?” DIRECT QUOTE. (Except for the part where he said males, bc apparently there was a time when people called men and women males and females.)

Like, maybe this will get contradicted later, but so far, that has been the pattern with him.

summary: MARVELOUS ALTERNYTE | Final Fantasy X Marvel Suprise! I’ve been working on this AU for a while now, writing down details about...
caption:
MARVELOUS ALTERNYTE | Final Fantasy X Marvel

Suprise! I’ve been working on this AU for a while now, writing down details about the world and its characters. Final Fantasy has always been my favorite game franchise and Final Fantasy XV has been my favorite title from the series.

For this AU I essentially wanted to rewrite the MCU as if Square Enix was creating their own world from it. So I’ll be posting alternate versions of our favorite heroes and villains from the MCU as well as sharing some facts about the world. Also, expect references and homages to our favorite FF moments and characters 😉. I have ideas for a lot of the characters so far, but who would you like to see next? (I was thinking the alternate Loki, Tony, Wanda, or Pietro next)

Here’s the text for those who have trouble reading.

Pietra Benjamin Parks
aka Pete

“Being a young boy from a small town, Pietra (or Pete as he prefers) often dreamed of traveling across the continent in search for adventure. Orphaned at a young age, Pete was taken in by his aunt and uncle, living above and working in their family bookstore Carbuncle Books. But when enemy forces invaded the town, Pete’s uncle was one of many to be struck down. Pete fought hard but was bloodied and bruised none the less. Enemy soldiers took him into the caves on the outskirts of town and left for dead - a place rumored to be the den of a hideous monstrosity.

While Pete never believed the tales himself, the stories were at least somewhat true. A creature did lie in wait in the caves; a Spider-Daemon bound there through strong magic. It was monstrous in appearance, but kind at heart, and did not wish to harm the frightened boy. Instead, the daemon made him an offer.

“Forge a covenant with me, young man. Let our souls become one, free me from this dark and dismal prison, and you shall have all my power in exchange. With it, you can protect the ones you hold dear.”

Weak and scared - and left with no other option - Pete took the Spider’s offer. With a single spider bite, their pact was signed and Pete was ready to fight once more.”
